results.title: Metformin Protects Radiation-Induced Early Brain Injury by Reducing Inflammation and DNA Damage
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been reported to have anti-@<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@RIBI@@@ activity as a first-line anti@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@-diabetic drug@@@.

results.title: Protection from Radiation-induced Damage in Rat's Ileum and Colon by Combined Regimens of Melatonin and Metformin: A Histopathological Study
results.text_hl: Similarly, administering @CHEMICAL_Melatonin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008550 @@@melatonin@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suppressed @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation damage@@@ in goblet cells (p=0.005).

results.title: Evaluation of the Mitigation Effect of Spirulina Against Lung Injury Induced by Radiation in Rats.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: This study aimed to examine the mitigation efficiency of @SPECIES_551299 @@@Spirulina@@@ compared to the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@. METHODS: 25 male Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were allotted in five groups: control, @SPECIES_551299 @@@Spirulina@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@Radiation@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@Radiation@@@ plus @SPECIES_551299 @@@Spirulina@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@Radiation@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Ahmadvand MH, Nikzad S, Changizi V, Pashaki AS, Najafi M, Mirzaei F. Evaluation of the Mitigation Effect of Spirulina Against Lung Injury Induced by Radiation in Rats. Curr Radiopharm. 2022 Apr 18;():. PMID: 35440331

results.title: Metformin Protects the Intestinal Barrier by Activating Goblet Cell Maturation and Epithelial Proliferation in Radiation-Induced Enteropathy
results.text_hl: These data suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be a potential therapeutic agent for @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced @DISEASE_Autoimmune_enteropathy @DISEASE_MESH:C538273 @@@enteropathy@@@.

results.text_hl: The combined treatment with @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@PS@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ sustained the activated stem cell properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation-induced intestinal injury@@@.

results.title: The metformin immunoregulatory actions in tumor suppression and normal tissues protection.
results.text_hl: Some investigations have uncovered that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can ameliorate @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@/chemotherapy @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ in normal cells and tissues through the modulation of several targets in cells and tissues.

results.title: Metformin effects on brain development following cranial irradiation in a mouse model.
results.text_hl: In many structures, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration starting on the day of irradiation exacerbated @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation-induced injury@@@, particularly in male @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Akkermansia muciniphila protects the intestine from irradiation-induced injury by secretion of propionic acid
results.text_hl: Application of probiotics or their regulators, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, could be an effective treatment for the protection of @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation exposure@@@-damaged intestine.
